comprehensive_overview: NAMD3 is a parallel molecular dynamics code designed for high-performance simulation of large biomolecular systems. It is capable of running on a wide range of hardware platforms, from individual workstations to large HPC clusters, making it suitable for a variety of research applications in biophysics and computational biology.
core_features: Parallel computing capabilities for efficient simulations
Support for a wide range of molecular dynamics simulations
Advanced algorithms for improved accuracy and efficiency
